short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily take and share screenshots of webpages from Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture, edit and share images from chrome quickly and easily using Screengrub! Clicking the screengrub extension icon will capture an image from your browser, open a screengrub editor page for you to add some final touches, then direct you to a permanent previewable link to the image for you to share across platforms.
